name: Fog of Many Deaths
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You create a faintly multicolored fog in a 30 foot cube within range. Creatures in the fog when it is created and who start their turn inside must succeed on a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, they must roll 1d6. They are poisoned and have their speed halved until the start of their next turn on a roll of 1 or 2, are paralyzed until the start of their next turn on a roll of 3 or 4, and are unconscious on a roll of 5 or 6, woken only by taking damage or when the spell ends.

At the end of each of your turns, the fog expands its area by 5 feet, unless it is in an area of strong wind. It stops expanding once it covers a 60 foot cube.
